content: Does anyone know if there is/will be a place where I can find the links to payer API portals? Right now I'm having to Google to find payers who have stood up their FHIR API portals for CMS Interoperability

@Christopher Swartz @Ron Urwongse Is CAQH (or anybody else) maintaining a directory of CMS interoperability APIs?
Re: https://www.caqh.org/solutions/caqh-endpoint-directory

@Aaron Walker In the mean time (hard-core stop gap), would you share your list so others can add? Maybe on the HL7 Confluence so others can add? The Connectathon lists should cover most any serious implementation; unfortunately, the spreadsheet doesn't indicate who is ready for public (i.e. they want people to hit them) vs who is still developing.
